info.name: Smart Technologies Bangladesh B2C API - Complete v2
info.description: Comprehensive Postman collection for Smart Technologies Bangladesh B2C E-commerce API v1.0.0. Includes all 65+ endpoints across all modules with authentication, testing scripts, and environment variables.

item.name: ðŸ” Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account with email or phone verification
Login user with email/phone and password, returns JWT token and session
Logout user from current device or all devices
Refresh JWT token with existing token
Verify email address with verification token
Send OTP to phone number for verification
Request password reset link via email
Reset password with token from email
Get list of supported mobile operators
Refresh session using remember me token
